channel.title: RuneCentre - 2006 Remake Project! GF Vault
channel.description:
[ul][list][list][list][list][list][CENTER][IMG]http://runecentre.com/img/title2/banner4.png[/img]
[SIZE=4]WELCOME[/SIZE]
[SIZE=2]Thank you for taking the time to review our project thread. RuneCentre.com is proud to present to you an official remake community. We strive for perfection, and don't settle for less. We have an amazing team of dedication to back us up. We are based on the era of RuneScape back in 2006. We are going to have 100% content up until the day RuneScape officially died. From there on, we will continue to develop RuneCentre based on how the community would like to see it improve. Enjoy! [/SIZE]
[SIZE=3]The RuneCentre Team[/SIZE][/CENTER]
[list] [*]Head of RuneCentre: Mod Zynna [*]Community Manager: Mod Dave [*]Content Developer: Mod Vayken (Yes, Vayken from 06scape) [*]Content Developer: Mod Alch [*]Web Developer: Mod Allen [/list]
[CENTER][SIZE=4][IMG]http://runecentre.com/img/news/scroll.gif[/img][U][B][I]Content Log[/I][/B][/U][/SIZE][/CENTER]
KEY:
[COLOR=#008000]Content Completed [/COLOR][COLOR=#ff8c00]Content in Progress [/COLOR][COLOR=#ff0000]Content not Started [/COLOR][CENTER][SIZE=3][IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122084602/runescape/images/5/51/Attack-icon.png[/img][B][I][U]Combat[/U][/I][/B][/SIZE][/CENTER]
[list] [*][COLOR=#008000]PVP fully complete[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]PVN fully complete[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]X-logging (if disconnected during combat, logs out only after 60 seconds or death[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Perfect max hit formulas[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Perfect accuracy formula[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Every weapon special attack[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Equipment effects (i.e. barrows)[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Equipment requirements[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Degradable equipment[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Weapon poisoning[/COLOR] [/list] [CENTER][IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122182528/runescape/images/7/77/Magic-icon.png[/img][U][I][B][SIZE=3]Magic[/SIZE][/B][/I][/U][/CENTER]
[list] [*][COLOR=#008000]Every modern combat spell[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Every ancient combat spell[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Can't mage through walls[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Staves that give unlimited amount of runes working[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Charge w/ godspells[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Iban blast/Slayer dart[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Weakening spells[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Teleblock/binding/freezing[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Every other spell including:[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]B2b/B2p[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Charging orbs[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Alching/Superheat[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Enchanting jewelry[/COLOR] [/list] [CENTER][IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122082216/runescape/images/7/72/Ranged-icon.png[/img][U][I][B][SIZE=3]Range [/SIZE][/B][/I][/U][/CENTER]
[list] [*][COLOR=#008000]Bows/arrows[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Throwing weapons (knives, darts, javelins, throwing axes)[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Crossbows (the regular one and karil's)[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Ranged distances (9 steps for long range, 7 steps for normal)[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Correct delays[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Correct projectiles[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Clipped projectiles[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Specials[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Bolts[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Clipped cannon balls[/COLOR] [/list]
[CENTER][SIZE=3][ATTACH=CONFIG]6563[/ATTACH][U][I][B]Prayer[/B][/I][/U][/SIZE][/CENTER]
[list] [*][COLOR=#ff8c00]Bone burry[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#ff8c00]Bone on alters[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#ff8c00]Correct prayer draining[/COLOR] [/list] [CENTER][SIZE=3][IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122191028/runescape/images/2/28/Mining-icon.png[/img][U][I][B]Mining[/B][/I][/U][/SIZE][/CENTER]
[list] [*][COLOR=#008000]Rocks lose ore[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Rock refill[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]All ores can be mined[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#ff8c00]Random chance of obtaining gems[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#ff8c00]Correct pickaxe finding and animations[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#ff0000]Prospecting[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#ff0000]Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms[/COLOR] [/list] [CENTER][SIZE=3][IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122232122/runescape/images/d/df/Smithing-icon.png[/img][U][I][B]Smithing[/B][/I][/U][/SIZE][/CENTER]
[list] [*][COLOR=#008000]All correct bars can be smelted[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]All bars can be forged into items[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Ring of forging[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Correct animations[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Interfaces[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Correct objects used[/COLOR] [/list] [CENTER][SIZE=3][IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120123002212/runescape/images/0/0b/Fishing-icon.png[/img][U][I][B]Fishing [/B][/I][/U][/SIZE][/CENTER]
[list] [*][COLOR=#008000]Fishing requirements[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Fishing delays depending on current level[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Fishing spots[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Shrimp[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Anchovies[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Sardine[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Salmon[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Trout[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Giant Carb[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Cod[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Herring[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Pike[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Mackerel[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Tuna[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Bass[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Lobster[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Swordfish[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Shark[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Monkfish[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Manta Ray[/COLOR] [/list] [CENTER][IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122233049/runescape/images/f/f7/Cooking-icon.png[/img][U][I][B]Cooking[/B][/I][/U][/CENTER]
[list] [*][COLOR=#008000]Correct cooking delays[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Correct animations[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Cooking burning[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]You will not burn food when you are 20 levels higher than the requirement[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Meat[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]All fish[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Pies[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Stews[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Pizzas[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Cakes[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Wine[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Hot drinks[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Potatoes[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Diary[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Brew making[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Cooking gauntlets[/COLOR] [/list] [COLOR=#ff0000] [/COLOR][CENTER][SIZE=3][ATTACH=CONFIG]6562[/ATTACH][I][U][B]Woodcutting[/B][/U][/I][/SIZE][/CENTER]
[list] [*][COLOR=#008000]Stumps[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Trees grow back[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Correct hatchet finding[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Correct hatchet animations[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]All trees cut-able[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Correct fail chance algorithms[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Birds nest falling out[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Correct level requirements[/COLOR] [/list] [CENTER][IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120121214504/runescape/images/6/6d/Firemaking-icon.png[/img][B][I][U]Firemaking[/U][/I][/B][/CENTER]
[list] [*][COLOR=#008000]All logs light able[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Clipped Firemaking[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Walks west unless blocked then will choose next most appropriate direction[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]You cannot light a fire on-top of a fire[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Normal logs[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Oak Logs[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Willow Logs[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Maple logs[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Yew logs[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Magic logs[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Firelighters[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Colored fires[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Ashes appear after logs burn out[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#008000]Correct animations[/COLOR] [/list] [CENTER][SIZE=3][IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122221425/runescape/images/thumb/8/84/Agility-icon.png/90x55x2-Agility-icon.png[/img][U][I][B]Agility
[/B][/I][/U][/SIZE][/CENTER]
[list] [*][COLOR=#ff8c00]Gnome, Wilderness, Pyramid and Brimhaven courses usable[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#ff8c00]Run energy affected(weight + level)[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#ff8c00]Force movement mask[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#ff8c00]Correct animations used[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#ff8c00]Short cuts[/COLOR] [/list] [CENTER][SIZE=3][IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122235048/runescape/images/f/f1/Herblore-icon.png[/img][U][I][B]Herblore[/B][/I][/U][/SIZE][/CENTER]
[list] [*][COLOR=#ff0000]Correct animations[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#ff0000]Correct level requirements[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#ff0000]Herb Identifying[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#ff0000]Herb cleaning[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#ff0000]All potions can be made[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#ff0000]Correct first and secondary ingredients[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#ff0000]Coconut making[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#ff0000]Item grinding(pestle use)[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#ff0000]Poisoning weapons(all types)[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#ff0000]Can pour doses into other potions (must be the same potion)[/COLOR] [/list] [CENTER][SIZE=3][ATTACH=CONFIG]6561[/ATTACH][U][I][B]Thieving[/B][/I][/U][/SIZE][/CENTER]

item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“Togasa, post:63, topic:461909”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=564857.msg4151073#msg4151073 date=1352436157]

rofl…

This is moparscape. I’m not gonna fix the post.

The owner of this project has over 3 quarters of a million dollars. He’s dedicating his time to this. We will be guaranteed success.

pft
saying 3 and million in the same sentence to trick us NT NOOB LOAEP

“This is moparscape. I’m not gonna fix this post”

Oh we aren’t worth your time I forgot now if this was the high-class-full-of-expert-programmers-that-make-shitty-pis-all-day land r-s that would have been different

So tell me sir why are you posting here if that would be the case
[/quote]
Seriously ppl need to stop fucking putting Moparscape down… If it wasn’t for this community there
[size=90pt]WOULD NOT[/size]
be a R-S or any of the tutorials you find on other communites and on Google. I’m really going to get fucking banned one day because of the rage you little pricks cause me when you say completely stupid shit like what was said above. If this place is “just moparscape” then it’s simple…why don’t you just
[size=90pt]GTFO.[/size] <— See, that’s a period… a fucking huge, bright red period at that… meaning this conversation is over.[/quote]

Perhaps not so much because of the rage, but because of that large annoying red text.

You have a point though.

Read full topic

Oh we aren’t worth your time I forgot now if this was the high-class-full-of-expert-programmers-that-make-shitty-pis-all-day land r-s that would have been different

So tell me sir why are you posting here if that would be the case

item.title: RuneCentre - 2006 Remake Project! GF Vault
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Just really read through this, it’s idiotic. I come from a family with a lot of money and I’m surrounded daily by people who have as much money as us if not more, I can guarantee that not one of them would invest anything such as that in a game. We’d much rather go out and buy a new watch and go to the strippers than buy idiotic things in a game just to prove a point against something.

You said something about Vault being in it for the money but if you look a little farther back you stated something along the lines of “Who isn’t in it for the money? Everyone is!” which means you’re also in it.

You care more about the publicity than the game itself and I can 100% guarantee that once you shut your server down you’ll have a thousand private messages on any form of community you use telling you to restart it. It’s not worth it, trust me.

Read full topic
